name: Chaos Control (itch)
description:
This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Chaos Control Is a puzzle platformer, where you take a place as a virus that is spreading and control cyborgs created by one genius scientist. Sadly, all cyborgs went out of the control and you can only control half of their abilities, which means the other half are out of the control. Your objective is to destroy them all!
